short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy any domain, subdomain, name server on email on the web with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
As a domainer I was frustrated how much of my time I waste just selecting domains names on the web, before or after I put them in a tool to analyze. Copy and paste gets much faster with this extension that I have used in the past 3 months myself before publishing. 

After a domain is successfully copied, a thin blue line around it marks the fact that you're ready to paste it elsewhere (see screenshot).

As a nice side effect it also copies emails and subdomains/hosts (including name servers).

By default it works with right click only to copy but you can use the Options to change to Ctrl + click, Shift + Click or Alt + click.

Feedback is welcome at infо [at] edoms.com

Kalin Karakehayov (manages a portfolio of 45,000 domain names for https://edoms.com)

By default it works with right click only to copy but you can use the Options to change to Ctrl + click, Shift + Click or Alt + click.
